markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Elk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2201)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Elk are exceptionally adaptable survivors. Most breeds stand between 3 and 5 feet tall and weigh between 350 and 550 pounds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Elk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2201)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 608, [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +7; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 20

**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=6)** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 17

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
antlers +7,
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +7,
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Startled Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirement** First round of combat; **Effect** The startled elk Strides twice and then makes a hoof Strike. If the Strike hits, the elk deals an additional 1d4 bludgeoning damage.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-301" />
name: Elk
